thread.title: BRIEF-Limbach Holdings Qtrly Diluted Earnings Per Share $0.12

title: BRIEF-Limbach Holdings Qtrly Diluted Earnings Per Share $0.12
text:
April 2 (Reuters) - Limbach Holdings Inc:
* LIMBACH HOLDINGS REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND YEAR-END 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 REVENUE $131.4 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $118 MILLION
* ‍AGGREGATE BACKLOG AT DEC 31, 2017 WAS $461.4 MILLION​ * AGGREGATE BACKLOG AT DECEMBER 31, 2017 WAS $461.4 MILLION
* DUE TO REVALUATION OF DEFERRED TAX ASSETS, CO TOOK A ONE-TIME CHARGE OF $1.7 MLN IN Q4​
* SEES FY 2018 REV ‍$510 MLN - $530 MLN​
* SEES FY2018 ‍ADJUSTED EBITDA $20 MLN - $24 MLN​
* QTRLY DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.12 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
